comments.comment: Metanady obathuma kiyana katha pahadilei saha nirawul.. anekuth vedioswalath elesamai, a wagema man hitanawa  warthamana hamudapathita wada obathuma me trastawadaya pitudakinna widimath wadapiliwelak karanna haki ayeku bawa, eka karannath puluwan plan ekakin tamai, a wagema obatumage katawala chodana wadipramanayak janadhipathita angilla digu karanawa mn dakinawa etanady agamathi obawa balalun lawa kos ata bawanawa wag wadak karana bawa.. a wagema ai oba thuma janatawage patte sita kata karanawa namuth keneku lesa (  trastawadeen pattakin tiyamuko) wartamanaye muslim ayage kriyakalapaya pilibandawa aspanapita wena pahara asadaranakam pilibandawa ai ai kata nokaranne.. baduurdin pattakin tiyamuko palliye kadui gedara kadui tiyena eke rate neetiyata anuwa waradei, ai a gana kata nokaranne,

comments.comment: Oba thamai eelanga Janadhipathi venna ona. Oba issarata vada dan morapu deshapalakayek vashayen apita penava. amatharava oba taram kavuruth danumen saha iganeemen ratak hasuravanna othana vitharak nemei ratema naha. Ape saamanya minisunta terenne naha sudussa kohomada thoranne kiyala. Baya nathuva oba eelanga varaye Janadhipathi chandayata enna, avith ballanne oba anivarayen dinanava dinanavamai.
